components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays To The Orange Network In Cameroon

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the Orange network in Cameroon. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the Orange network in Cameroon. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: We continue to face delays while vetting 10DLC campaigns. A 3rd party agency is reviewing campaigns manually and due to the high volume of requests, a queue has built up. Campaign reviews are expected to take over 15 business days approximately until the situation is resolved. Twilio is working with the provider to help expedite this process. We will provide another update every 7 days. Next update will be provided on 02/24/2023 at 10:45 am Pacific Time or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to face delays while vetting 10DLC campaigns. A 3rd party agency is reviewing campaigns manually and due to the high volume of requests, a queue has built up. Campaign reviews are expected to take over 7 days until the situation is resolved. Twilio is working with the provider to help expedite this process. We expect to provide another update in next 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We've become aware of a potential issue with A2P 10DLC campaign reviews, facing delays due to high volume. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have additional information.

The Megafon network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 20 February 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Megafon Russia handsets.

The Yota network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 February 2023 at 12:00 PST until 20 February 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Yota Russia handsets.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 February 2023 at 13:00 PST until 20 February 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner in Germany and Austria is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 February 2023 at 16:00 PST until 20 February 2023 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent call failures to a subset of Germany and Austria phone numbers.

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier T-Mobile in Czech Republic is conducting a planned maintenance between 01 March 2022 at 16:00 PDT until 01 March 2022 at 19:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent disconnection to existing calls and call failures to and from T-Mobile Czech Republic handsets
